Text.Page:
The nagas gather at the tomb of their creator-god, Dagon. And with {@LinkCreature:10#13#naga bloodscales} and {@LinkCreature:10#14#naga wyrmlings}, they're awfully confident that we can't strike them there.

You're going to show them how wrong they are. I expect to you to come back with their scales. Trophies send messages, you know.

Now they're outnumbered, not us.

And we have these handy new trophies. Maybe we should mount them.

I know the place is crawling—or slithering, I suppose—with nagas.

Think of it as a "target-rich environment."
